title: (x) "Where have all the crazies gone?" stencil face - Cargo {Mark Foster}
content:
Hi,

I know this typeface and have seen it just recently, but for the life of me, I am unable to remember the name of it. I have been struggling with the name for the last two days and have decided that I am beaten. Can anyone help?

Thanks in advane.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [stencil.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011161324/http:/typophile.com/files/stencil.jpg) | 32.05 KB |

 [‹ (x) Hustle & Flow movie logo - Simian {Hanno Bennert}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011161324/http:/typophile.com/node/21230 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) eSP logo - Aachen, Lubalin Graph, Souvenir {Tiff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081011161324/http:/typophile.com/node/21204 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Corey Holms

comments.content: Thank you - I was convinced it was a Lineto, which it obviously wasn’t. I should have thought of Optimo.
